headline: Jack Van Impe, 88, End Times Preacher on TV
abstract: Known for his prodigious memorization of the Bible, he mingled scripture with commentary on public affairs.
lead_paragraph: Jack Van Impe, a televangelist who reached a wide audience interpreting current events through apocalyptic passages of the Bible and prophesying the end of the world, died on Saturday at a hospital in Royal Oak, Mich. He was 88.
